layer.name: Order
layer.definition: Reality has patterns that can be discovered and used.

answers.4: generally — I can see how growth usually works
answers.5: absolutely — there are clear principles for spiritual development
answers.2: possibly — but I haven't found them
answers.3: sometimes — some patterns are visible, others hidden
answers.1: not at all — it's random or mysterious

questions.text: Identifiable steps and practices that lead toward holiness are ...

answers.4: generally known — the path is mostly mapped
answers.5: well established — Scripture and tradition show the way
answers.2: unclear — maybe they exist but I don't know them
answers.3: partially known — some steps are clear, others aren't
answers.1: a myth — holiness is either given or not

questions.text: Scripture's progression (milk to solid food, faith to love in 2 Peter 1) suggests ...

answers.4: an ordered developmental path we can follow
answers.5: clear evidence that spiritual growth is structured and sequential
answers.2: maybe some pattern — but hard to apply
answers.3: a general direction — though not a precise map

questions.text: Holiness being just luck or unattainable mystery is ...
questions.principle: Holiness is accessible through ordered practice

answers.4: mostly wrong — holiness is achievable through known means
answers.5: completely wrong — the path is open to anyone who walks it
answers.2: probably true — I don't see how to get there myself
answers.3: partly true — there's effort involved, but also factors beyond me
answers.1: accurate — some people are just more spiritual

questions.text: The path to spiritual maturity can be studied and followed ...
questions.principle: Spiritual maturity has a learnable path

answers.4: mostly — the main principles are learnable
answers.5: absolutely — it's a well-marked trail for those who look
answers.2: somewhat — but mostly you just have to hope
answers.3: partially — some aspects can be studied, others can't
answers.1: not really — it's too personal and mysterious
